New Records: Pakistan bowlers bundled New Zealand for a meagre 90 in the second T20I of the five-match series
Key Match Events: Shaheen Afridi wrecked the stumps with a searing yorker, dismissing New Zealand's last batsman
Shadab Khan took a fabulous catch to dismiss Glenn Phillips
Saim Ayub took a well-judged diving catch to dismiss Finn Allen
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan won the toss and opted to bowl first against New Zealand in the second T20I of the five-match series
Post-Match Reflections: Pakistan bowlers put in a dominant performance to crush New Zealand by seven wickets
Mohammad Rizwan's composed innings helped Pakistan achieve their target
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Pindi Cricket Stadium on Saturday
The series is a five-match series between Pakistan and New Zealand
